type.description: Badge type, can be set to default primary info success warning danger
type.description_zh: Badge type, can be set to default primary info success warning danger

dot.description: Whether the badge is a dot
dot.description_zh: Whether the badge is a dot

value.description: The value shown in the badge (takes effect when dot is false)
value.description_zh: The value shown in the badge (takes effect when dot is false)

max-value.description: The maximum value shown in the logo, when value is greater than max-value, displays max-value+ (effective when both value and max-value exist)
max-value.description_zh: The maximum value shown in the logo, when value is greater than max-value, displays max-value+ (effective when both value and max-value exist)

position.description: Define the position of the logo on other labels when there are other labels in the logo tag. Optional values are right-top right-bottom left-top left-bottom
position.description_zh: Define the position of the logo on other labels when there are other labels in the logo tag. Optional values are right-top right-bottom left-top left-bottom

icon.description: Customize the content of the icon in the badge (priority is higher than value)
icon.description_zh: Customize the content of the icon in the badge (priority is higher than value)

namespace.description: Customize the namespace of the icon in the badge
namespace.description_zh: Customize the namespace of the icon in the badge

slots.name: value
slots.description: The value shown in the badge
slots.description_zh: The value shown in the badge
